subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Kings are up, 3-0, and the Devils look lost in the Stanley Cup finals. The Thunder, however, seem to know exactly where they are going; they lead the Spurs, 3-2.
snippet: The Los Angeles Kings are up, 3-0, and the Devils look lost in the Stanley Cup finals. The Thunder, however, seem to know exactly where they are going; they lead the Spurs, 3-2.
